Text: Why dont you guys mark what network this is off of in the title anymore?? Its a royal pain in the ass to sit here for hours downloading something cause all these freeloaders dont seed only to find out that its BBC.... I would rather watch it on SPEED than BBC!! The guy that does commentary for them is so monotone and boring!! He doesnt know jack shit about racing either!! I appreciate all your effort but just wanted to suggest that to make it easier on all of us to watch what we love!
